argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | fulloppc.o | |- O = ( oppCat ` C ) |
| 2 |  | fulloppc.p | |- P = ( oppCat ` D ) |
| 3 |  | ffthoppc.f | |- ( ph -> F ( ( C Full D ) i^i ( C Faith D ) ) G ) |
| 4 |  | #P_brin | |- ( F ( ( C Full D ) i^i ( C Faith D ) ) G <-> ( F ( C Full D ) G /\ F ( C Faith D ) G ) ) |
| 5 | 3, 4 | #P_sylib | |- ( ph -> ( F ( C Full D ) G /\ F ( C Faith D ) G ) ) |
| 6 | 5 | #P_simpld | |- ( ph -> F ( C Full D ) G ) |
| 7 | 1, 2, 6 | #P_fulloppc | |- ( ph -> F ( O Full P ) tpos G ) |
| 8 | 5 | #P_simprd | |- ( ph -> F ( C Faith D ) G ) |
| 9 | 1, 2, 8 | #P_fthoppc | |- ( ph -> F ( O Faith P ) tpos G ) |
| 10 |  | #P_brin | |- ( F ( ( O Full P ) i^i ( O Faith P ) ) tpos G <-> ( F ( O Full P ) tpos G /\ F ( O Faith P ) tpos G ) ) |
| 11 | 7, 9, 10 | #P_sylanbrc | |- ( ph -> F ( ( O Full P ) i^i ( O Faith P ) ) tpos G ) |
